1.4.2.1
fixes:
	- Security fix		


1.4.2 - 09-03-2016
fixes:
	- Security and performance fixes (update is highly recommended!)

1.4.1 - 16-06-2016
fixes:
	- Plugin update notifications being blocked

1.4 - 07-04-2016
fixes:
	- Missing core users fields
	- Correctly decode specials chars like '&amp;'

changes:
	- Added guided help tour
	- Added help tabs
	- Added option to remove HTML tags from content output
	- Added support for exporting 'Pages'
	- Optimized sample content/fields loading performance
	- Show 'Cancel' button when content type is loading

1.3 - 22-01-2016
fixes:
	- Mixed content JS errors
	- Users main fields not being displayed on multi-site installs

changes:
	- Replaced clickable tooltips with hover tooltips

1.2 - 06-01-2016
changes:
	- Files and folders reorganization
	- Minor UI changes
	- Added option to hide/show WP internal fields
	- Added support for readable serialized values (export as 'Unserialized')

1.1.1 - 23-11-2015
fixes:
	- PHP 'Fatal error: Declaration of WP_XPRT_Fields_Table::row()' on some PHP versions

changes:
	- Internal code changes for better theme compatibility

1.1 - 2015-05-19
changes:
	- Replaced backend hardcoded input CSS widths with WP input CSS classes
	- Move to new plugin framework API

1.0.1 - 2014-11-13
fixes:
    - Fatal error when using plugin without an AppThemes theme
